plugins.name: ぼかし背景ジェネレーター
plugins.description:
# Image Aspect Ratio & Background Blur Generator Plugin


## Overview


This Figma plugin automatically generates a new frame from selected images (or rectangles with image fills),

with a **specified aspect ratio and width, and a blurred background**.


- Useful for creating SNS thumbnails and other aspect-ratio-fixed images

- Supports batch processing of multiple images at once


---


## Main Features


- **Aspect Ratio & Width Customization**

Choose from custom ratios or presets (16:9, 4:3, 1:1, etc.). You can freely specify the width (px).


- **Background Blur Effect**

The original image is enlarged and blurred as the background, with the original image centered. Blur strength and scale are adjustable.


- **Batch Processing**

Select multiple images or rectangles with image fills and generate all at once.


- **Automatic Saving & Restoration of Settings**

Your last-used settings are saved in Figma's clientStorage and automatically restored on next launch.


- **Japanese UI**

Intuitive and easy-to-use Japanese interface.


---


## How to Use


1. **Select images or rectangles with image fills**

Multiple selection is supported.


2. **Launch the plugin**

Set the aspect ratio, width, blur strength, and scale in the UI.


3. **Click the "Create" button**

A new frame with the specified ratio, width, and blurred background will be generated to the right of the selected image(s).


4. **Notification**

Success and error messages are shown at the bottom of the UI with color distinction.


---


## Notes


- Non-image nodes are automatically skipped.

- Settings are saved per Figma file.


---


## Data Security


- This plugin does **not** send any user data, images, or personal information to external servers.

- All settings are stored locally using Figma's `clientStorage` API.

- No external API or server communication is performed.


---


# 背景ブラー＆アスペクト比固定の画像生成プラグイン


## 概要


この Figma プラグインは、選択した画像（または画像 fill を持つ矩形）から、

**指定したアスペクト比・幅で新しいフレームを作成し、背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成**します。


- SNS 用サムネイルやサムネイル画像の自動生成に便利です

- 複数画像を一括で処理できます


---


## 主な機能


- **アスペクト比・幅の指定**

カスタム比率やプリセット（16:9, 4:3, 1:1 など）から選択可能。幅（px）も自由に指定できます。


- **背景ブラー効果**

元画像を拡大・ぼかして背景にし、中央に元画像を配置します。ブラー強度や拡大率も調整可能。


- **複数画像の一括処理**

複数の画像や画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択して一括で生成できます。


- **前回の設定値を自動保存・復元**

設定値は Figma の clientStorage に保存され、次回起動時に自動で復元されます。


- **日本語 UI**

直感的で使いやすい日本語インターフェース。


---


## 使い方


1. **画像または画像 fill を持つ矩形を選択**

複数選択も可能です。


2. **プラグインを起動**

UI でアスペクト比・幅・ブラー強度・拡大率を設定します。


3. **「作成」ボタンをクリック**

選択画像の右隣に、指定した比率・幅・ブラー背景付きの新しいフレームが自動生成されます。


4. **通知**

成功・エラーは画面下部に色分けして表示されます。


---


## 注意点


- 画像以外のノードは自動的にスキップされます。

- 設定値は Figma ファイルごとに保存されます。


---


## データセキュリティ


- 本プラグインはユーザーのデータや画像、個人情報を外部サーバーに一切送信しません。

- 設定値はFigmaの`clientStorage`機能を用いてローカル環境のみに保存されます。

- 外部APIや外部サーバーとの通信は一切行いません。
plugins.tagline: 選択した画像から、指定したアスペクト比・幅で背景をブラー（ぼかし）化した画像を自動生成します。

plugins.name: Section Auto-Resize with 200px Margin
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically resizes Figma Sections to fit their content and adds a 200px margin around the content area. It's designed to help teams maintain consistent spacing and layout rules without manually adjusting section boundaries.


Perfect for teams working with grid systems, spacing standards, or design system alignment workflows.
plugins.tagline: Auto-resize sections and apply consistent 200px margin padding.

plugins.name: Figue
plugins.description:
Transform your Figma workflow with Figue, the AI assistant that understands design.


Analyze frames, generate text variations, create images, and receive expert UI/UX advice through natural conversations.


Whether you need fresh content ideas, design feedback, or visual assets, Figue brings the power of GPT-4o directly into your design process.


Save time, spark creativity, and solve design challenges with an AI partner that speaks your language.
plugins.tagline: Your AI design partner inside Figma, transforming UI/UX workflows through smart conversations.

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: Variant Randomizer
plugins.description:
Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.


How it Works:

Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.

Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.

Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.


Why use Variant Randomizer?

Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.

Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.

Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.

Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.

Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.



You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
plugins.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

plugins.name: SuperLayer (copy)
plugins.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
plugins.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

131488.name: SuperLayer (copy)
131488.description:
SuperLayer (copy) lets you quickly view and copy the names of selected layers in your Figma file or FigJam board. It’s ideal for generating UI inventories, documentation, or simply organizing your layer structure. The plugin also shows each layer’s type and a thumbnail preview when available.


To use it, select one or more layers on your canvas and launch the plugin. A clean list view will appear with sorting options and checkboxes to include or exclude layers. Click the Copy button to copy all selected layer names to your clipboard, formatted line by line. The list updates automatically as you change your selection.


SuperLayer is optimized for speed and simplicity. It does not currently support exporting full metadata, nested hierarchy structures, or annotations. Thumbnails are generated when possible, but may not appear for certain FigJam elements or complex Figma nodes.
131488.tagline: Copy Figma and FigJam layer names with ease. Sortable and perfect for docs, audits, and checklists

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: Randomize
plugins.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

129638.name: Randomize
129638.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
129638.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

125915.name: Preview Card Creator
125915.description:

  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
125915.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: Arreglo
plugins.description:
https://arreglo.ai


Arreglo is a Figma plugin that helps music producers visualize song arrangements. Using AI with semantic pattern recognition, it generates musically intelligent arrangements based on your instrument patterns and track names, making it easy to plan and understand song structures.
plugins.tagline: Finish tracks faster with AI generated arrangement ideas!

120469.description:

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

plugins.name: Superduper Maps
plugins.description:
Superduper Maps brings real, interactive maps directly into your Figma designs. No more static screenshots or placeholder rectangles—insert dynamic, customizable maps with a single click. Pan, zoom, and explore in real-time, then export crisp, production-ready maps at any resolution. With 3D camera controls, custom styling options, and frame-perfect sizing, you can create stunning location-based designs that match your exact vision.


Core Features


🗺️ Interactive Map Preview

  1. Live canvas with real-time pan and zoom
  2. Smooth, responsive map exploration before inserting
  3. Instant visual feedback for all adjustments


📍 Precision Location Control

  1. Search any location worldwide with integrated geocoding
  2. Fine-tune latitude, longitude, and zoom levels
  3. One-click reset to default view


🎨 Professional Map Styles

  1. Access to 8+ premium map themes (Streets, Outdoors, Light, Dark, Satellite, Navigation)
  2. Import and save custom styles for brand consistency
  3. Real-time style switching and preview


📐 Advanced Camera Controls

  1. 3D perspective with adjustable bearing (0-360°) and tilt (0-60°)
  2. Create dramatic map angles and cinematic views
  3. Perfect for hero sections and showcase designs


⚡ Smart Frame Integration

  1. Automatically detects selected Figma frames
  2. Maps adapt perfectly to your frame dimensions
  3. Frame-perfect sizing every time


🖼️ High-Quality Export

  1. Export at 1x for web or 2x for retina displays
  2. Up to 4000x4000px export capability
  3. Consistent geographic coverage that matches preview


🚀 Performance Optimised

  1. Intelligent tile caching for faster loading
  2. Offline support for previously viewed areas
  3. Built specifically for Figma's architecture


Superduper Maps Pro

  1. 50 daily exports (vs 5 lifetime on free tier)
  2. Unlimited usage with your own Mapbox API key
  3. Cancel anytime - no long-term commitments


Coming Soon

  1. Google Maps integration
  2. OpenStreetMap support
plugins.tagline: Maps for Figma, super fast, super good

plugins.name: Font Detective
plugins.description:
Ever need to know exactly which fonts are in your project without clicking through dozens of text layers? Manually checking for fonts is slow and easy to miss one, especially in complex files.


Font Detective instantly scans your selection and provides a clean list of every font family it finds.


No more guesswork, no more hunting. ✨


How it works:


  1. Select a frame - Click on a single frame or select multiple frames
  2. Run "Font Detective" - One click and you're done
  3. Get results - Immediately see a complete list of all font families spotted within your selection. It's that simple!


Key Benefits:


  1. Quick Typography Audits - Get a fast and accurate inventory of the fonts in any file or component
  2. Maintain Consistency - Easily spot unwanted fonts that don't belong in your design system
  3. Streamline Cleanup - Use the generated list as a checklist to consolidate your font styles
  4. Effortless Handoff - Quickly provide a list of all used fonts to developers or teammates
  5. Simple & Fast - No complex settings. Just select and run for instant results


Perfect for designers, design teams, and anyone working with typography in Figma! 🎨


Feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: Lorenzo Brandimarte
accepted.description: Web and UI Designer | No-code developer

plugins.tagline: Font Detective scans your frame and provides a clean list of every font family it finds.

plugins.name: Atomic by BigBasket
plugins.description:
Built this to enhance design and development efficiency in BigBasket.


Atomic transforms a single hex code into a complete set of design tokens and themes, instantly applying your brand's unique identity across all your apps and websites. This powerful plugin streamlines multi-brand design systems and campaigns, allowing you to effortlessly generate themes, export developer-ready tokens, and maintain consistency across every product.


Features:


Theme Generator

Define your core brand colors and let Atomic intelligently adjust shades to create a complete palette. You can then export this palette directly to your Figma canvas or instantly generate Figma variables as a complete theme. This helps you create brand modes instantly with proper semantics, enabling faster iterations for brand campaigns and seamless experimentation with colors, fonts, and effects.


Export to JSON

Export all your Figma design tokens directly to JSON, providing developers with a consistent and up-to-date source of truth. This significantly speeds up hand-offs and reduces implementation discrepancies.


Effects

Precise shadow colors and configure them for smoother, more nuanced visual effects. Apply consistent effects across all your brands, updating global styles with ease.


Spacing & Radius

Establish a consistent visual rhythm and hierarchy using dedicated tokens for spacing and border radius. You can use default values or easily adjust them to perfectly align with your brand guidelines.


Neutrals and Semantics

Automatically generates essential primitives and neutral colors. These foundational elements are crucial for building a robust and flexible design system that scales across multiple brands.



Any feedback?

Connect at hello@uxmurali.com

accepted.name: Murali
accepted.description: Product Designer who strives to create meaningful experiences that make people's lives better.

plugins.tagline: Your Brand, Your Styles, Instantly. Just One Click.

plugins.name: Content Fillr
plugins.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!


Key Features:

  1. ⚡️ Auto-fill selected frames with unique, realistic avatar images.
  2. ✏️ Instantly generate AI-powered text content tailored to your needs.
  3. 🎯 Easy-to-use filters for avatars by gender.
  4. 🌐 Free avatar library sourced from Unsplash for hassle-free use.


Save time, boost productivity, and focus on the creative work you love.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Populate Designs with Smart Content & Avatars 🚀

138396.description:
ContentFillr streamlines your design workflow by instantly filling frames and text nodes with realistic avatars and meaningful content. No more manual placeholder updates, quickly bring your designs to life with one click!

138396.release_notes:
🌟 New Feature: Auto-Fill Logos in Your Designs!
You can now auto-fill selected frames with brand logos, just like avatars!

Here’s how it works:
1. Select your frames or shapes
2. Choose Logo from the Type dropdown
3. Hit Generate & Fill

Logos will be applied instantly, pulled from my curated logo library hosted on a fast, secure CDN.

plugins.name: Design Roaster
plugins.description:
Design Analyzer & Enhancer is your intelligent Figma assistant, designed to help you elevate your designs to the next level. With a single click, this plugin scans your entire Figma file, analyses your current design, and delivers a comprehensive review—including pros, cons, and actionable recommendations for improvement.

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

Key Features

• Automated Design Analysis: Instantly review your design’s strengths and areas for improvement.

• Actionable Recommendations: Get practical tips and suggestions tailored to your specific design.

• Proposed Enhanced Designs: Explore new design directions generated based on your current work.

• Easy to Use: One-click operation, no complex setup required.

• Boost Your Creativity: Use AI-powered insights to inspire your next great design.

• Transform your workflow, catch overlooked issues, and get inspired—all without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Designer's companion for better UX/UI by ABA Bank

plugins.name: Brand compliance check
plugins.description:
Branding compliance check Figma Plugin


Purpose

The Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.


Features

  1. Design Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.
  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.


Usage guidelines

  1. Select Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.
  2. Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
plugins.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned

135406.name: Brand compliance check
135406.description:

plugins.name: QuickData
plugins.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

Select the layers you want to update


Click the “Sync” button


🖊️ Text layers: name & content will update


🧱 Other layers: only name updates


🙌 Support Me

If you found this plugin helpful, consider supporting me:

👉 https://jdip19.github.io/support-jdip.html


💬 Have Feedback or Ideas?

📧 Contact me: ujaydip9@gmail.com


🔗 Follow me on LinkedIn for UI/UX & plugin design updates:

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
plugins.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

137348.name: QuickData
137348.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

Select the layers you want to update


Click the “Sync” button


🖊️ Text layers: name & content will update


🧱 Other layers: only name updates


🙌 Support Me

If you found this plugin helpful, consider supporting me:

👉 https://jdip19.github.io/support-jdip.html


💬 Have Feedback or Ideas?

📧 Contact me: ujaydip9@gmail.com


🔗 Follow me on LinkedIn for UI/UX & plugin design updates:

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
137348.release_notes:
## Version 2.0.0 (June 2025)

### Major Changes
- **Streamlined Data Syncing**
  - Simplified the core functionality to focus on direct Google Sheets integration
  - Improved data normalization for sheets with or without frozen headers
  - Enhanced error handling for invalid URLs and data formats

### UI Improvements
- **Tea Cup Animation**
  - Added animated steam effects with three particles
  - Implemented hover animations for the "Buy me tea" link
  - Refined positioning and styling of the tea cup SVG
  - Modified steam animation timing and positions

- **Instructions Modal**
  - Reorganized the "How to use" modal content for better clarity
  - Added clearer sections for:
    - Sheet preparation
    - Plugin usage
    - Layer syncing
  - Included tips about header rows and preview functionality

### Technical Improvements
- **Code Optimization**
  - Removed unused interfaces and functions for better maintainability
  - Streamlined the core data syncing logic
  - Improved error message handling
  - Enhanced logging for better debugging

### User Experience
- **Better Feedback**
  - Added clear success messages with layer count details
  - Improved error notifications with specific failure reasons
  - Added loading states during data fetch operations

### Documentation
- **Plugin Description**
  - Updated cover image text: "Instantly sync your Google Sheets data with Figma layers for seamless content updates"
  - Enhanced usage instructions and examples
137348.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

plugins.name: 핸드오프러브
plugins.description:
이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

나만의 발자님을 위한 사랑스러운 디자이너가 되어보세요



OVERVIEW

디자인 수정을 요청할 때, 핸드오프 문서를 전달할 때, QA를 진행할 때...

디자이너와 발자님과의 관계는 항상 위태롭습니다.

서로의 언어가 달라서 오해가 생길 때,

‘핸드오프러브’로 사랑이 담긴 핸드오프 러브레터를 보내보세요!


HOW IT WORKS

발자님께 전할 내용을 입력하고 발자님의 언어를 선택하기만 하면,

사랑스러운 핸드오프 내용으로 변환되어 내 피그마에 러브레터가 첨부됩니다.


FEATURES


1. 8개 이상의 개발 언어를 연인 스타일로 지원

Python부터 Java, JS, SQL, Go, TypeScript, C++, 그리고 Android 개발자를 위한 Kotlin 언어를 지원하며 각 언어에 특화된 말투와 이미지가 지원됩니다.


2. 사랑이 담긴 고급 프롬프트 패턴 엔진

수개월 간 직접 설계한 각 언어 별 프롬프트 패턴이 적용되어 있으며, 수많은 연애 경험을 살려 고안한 실전 문장으로 변환됩니다.


3. 디자이너 취향저격 러브레터 디자인

문장 입력만으로 사랑가득한 러브레터 카드가 자동 생성되며 텍스트 수정도 가능합니다.


4. 복사 버튼으로 슬랙/노션에 바로 붙여넣기

핸드오프가 메모처럼 가볍고 예뻐지는 순간을 경험해보세요


5. 발자님과의 갈등을 없애는 최적의 팀워크 도구

단순 문장을 사랑스럽게 바꾸는 것을 넘어 실제 개발자들이 디자이너의 말을 오해 없이 받아들이고, 더 나아가 사랑이 시작될지도...


6. “말 때문에 생기는 오해”를 구조적으로 해결

오빠, input()만 해주면 돼. 나머진 이 플러그인이 알아서 해줄 거야.


문의할 내용이 있다면,

doingseo0906@gmail.com으로 언제든지 연락주세요 :>
plugins.tagline: 이제, 당신의 핸드오프에도 로맨스가 필요할 때.

133082.name: 핸드오프러브

plugins.name: SheetSync For DeSo
plugins.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

Effortlessly generate multiple design variations, product cards, user profiles, and more by connecting to:

  1. Google Sheets (Public Links)
  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
plugins.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

138524.name: SheetSync For DeSo
138524.description:
SheetSync For DeSo: Spreadsheets to Figma Design Variations


Tired of manual data entry in Figma? SheetSync For DeSo revolutionizes your workflow by letting you populate design frames directly from your data sources.

  2. Local CSV/XLSX Files

Rename your Figma text and image layers to match your spreadsheet headers (e.g., #product_name, #image_url), select your template frame, and let SheetSync do the rest! It even includes robust image fetching with retry options.
138524.tagline: Design at Scale, Sheet to Shape

plugins.name: 今日の日付
plugins.description:
今日の日付をテキストプロパティに入力するだけのプラグインです。


  1. インスタンスを選択してください。
  2. プラグインを立ち上げてください。
  3. プロパティを選択します。
  4. 「今日の日付を入力」押下。
  5. インスタンスを選び直した時は、更新ボタンを押してください。


This plugin just inserts today's date into a text property.
plugins.tagline: 今日の日付をテキストプロパティに入力するだけのプラグイン

plugins.name: Refine Selection
plugins.description:
Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma


Transform your selection workflow with this powerful tool that helps you select and deselect layers with precision. Perfect for designers who work with complex designs and need quick access to specific layer types.


Key Features:

• One-Click Selection: Instantly select all layers of a specific type within your current selection

• Alt+Click to Deselect: Hold Alt (or Option) to deselect layers instead of selecting them

• Smart Layer Detection: Automatically identifies and filters:

- Text layers

- All shapes

- Primitives (stars, polygons, lines, rectangles, ellipses)

- Paths

- Lines

- Image layers

- Frame layers

- Components

- Instances


Workflow Benefits:

• Save Time: No more manual selection of multiple layers

• Reduce Errors: Precise selection of specific layer types

• Smart UI: Buttons automatically disable when no matching layers are found

• Intuitive Design: Clean interface with visual feedback


Perfect For:

Designers working with complex layouts

Teams managing large design systems

Anyone who needs to quickly select specific layer types

Designers who frequently work with nested components


💡 Pro Tip: Hold Alt (or Option) while clicking to deselect layers instead of selecting them!


Note: Free version includes rate limiting of 50 selection per minute. Subscribe to remove limitations and support future development.
plugins.tagline: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma

plugins.name: Code-Generator Plugin
plugins.description: Want a quick mockup code to describe your figma UI? just simply select your block of design, provide your open api key and you will get your design written as code in seconds with OpenAI API
plugins.tagline: generate your selected UI into code

139183.name: Code-Generator Plugin
139183.description: Want a quick mockup code to describe your figma UI? just simply select your block of design, provide your open api key and you will get your design written as code in seconds with OpenAI API

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access the OpenAI API to generate code based on user input. The plugin also uses jsDelivr to export generated code to zip file and cdn.tailwindcss.com to preview generated html

139183.release_notes: preview images in plugin and display images in html
139183.tagline: generate your selected UI into code

plugins.name: ColorGen AI
plugins.description: ColorGen AI is a powerful tool for generating custom color palettes. Users can input colors using hex codes, adjust HSL values, or use the color picker tool to pick the color from your design. The platform simplifies color selection, making it easy to explore and refine shades for design projects. Click on any color to copy its hex code effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Unlock the Magic of Colors – Create, Explore, and Design with Confidence!

128892.name: ColorGen AI
128892.description: ColorGen AI is a powerful tool for generating custom color palettes. Users can input colors using hex codes, adjust HSL values, or use the color picker tool to pick the color from your design. The platform simplifies color selection, making it easy to explore and refine shades for design projects. Click on any color to copy its hex code effortlessly.
128892.tagline: Unlock the Magic of Colors – Create, Explore, and Design with Confidence!
